article:
'Sex steroids', also known as 'gonadal steroids', are steroid hormones that
interact with vertebrate androgen or estrogen receptors. Guerriero G.
:)Vertebrate sex steroid receptors: evolution, ligands, and neurodistribution.
Ann N Y Acad Sci. 2009 April; 1163:154-68. Review. PMID 19456336 Their
effects are mediated by slow genomic mechanisms through nuclear receptors as
well as by fast nongenomic mechanisms through membrane-associated receptors and
signaling cascades. Thakur MK, Paramanik V. Role of steroid hormone
coregulators in health and disease. Horm Res. 2009; 71(4):194-200. Epub 2009
March 4. Review. PMID 19258710 The term 'sex hormone' is nearly always
synonymous with sex steroid. The non-steroid hormones luteinizing hormone, follicle-
stimulating hormone and gonadotropin-releasing hormone are usually not regarded
as sex hormones, although they play major sex-related roles.
